Title: Numerical Reasoning Test
Description: Assesses understanding of tables of statistical and numerical data

Title: Verbal Reasoning Test
Description: Measures the ability to understand written information and evaluate arguments

Title: Inductive Reasoning Test
Description: Evaluates ability to identify patterns and predict outcomes

Title: Deductive Reasoning Test
Description: Measures logical conclusion skills based on given info

Title: Situational Judgment Test
Description: Assesses decision making in work-related scenarios

Title: Checking Test
Description: Measures accuracy in identifying data errors

Title: Filing - Names (R1)
Description: Measures ability to sort names in alphabetical order

Title: Contact Center Simulation
Description: Assesses skills for customer support roles

Title: Technical Skills Assessment
Description: Measures technical knowledge like Cloud/Data Engineering
